main.name: Zlatko Skoric
main.description: I am a Front-End Web developer. I use ReactJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, frameworks, libraries, Figma, Adobe PS, Material UI to develop efficient, intuitive, dynamic user interfaces and interactive web applications
main.bio: As a junior ReactJS developer, I am passionate about crafting efficient, intuitive, dynamic user interfaces and interactive web applications. I continuously strive to expand my knowledge and stay updated with the latest industry trends. Beyond my technical skills, I approach my work with a detail-oriented mindset and a dedication to delivering high-quality code. I am a friendly team player and enthusiastic developer, actively seeking opportunities to contribute to impactful projects and further refine my skills in the dynamic realm of web development.
main.contactmessage: If you'd like to get in touch with me, feel free to use this platform. Your thoughts, inquiries, or any opportunities are all welcome. Use my resume website at https://zlatkoresume.netlify.app/

education.description: I gained a comprehensive understanding of business principles and strategic management. Through coursework and practical projects, I developed valuable skills in leadership, critical thinking, and problem-solving, setting a strong foundation for my professional career.
This experience equipped me with a solid understanding of brand management, effective communication, and market research, enabling me to apply these skills in real-world marketing scenarios.

education.school: React - The Complete Guide 2023 (incl. React Router & Redux), Academind led by Maximilian Schwarzm√ºller
education.description: Through this comprehensive course, I gained a solid understanding of React, including advanced concepts such as React Router and Redux, enabling me to develop dynamic and efficient web applications.

work.title: Independent Entrepreneur
work.description: I have held various positions in marketing, design, sales, administration for ZenCart and Magento, IT product management (Trello and similar) and gym trainer (5 years). I assisted a marketing agency in developing strategies for promoting and selling new and existing products, gaining experience in marketing, Adobe Photoshop, pharmaceutical products, supplements etc. I lived in Thailand for approximately five years and gained valuable experience in a multicultural environment.

work.title: Accountant and HR
work.description: During my employment, my responsibilities encompassed administration, the implementation and alignment of labor laws, salary calculations, accounting tasks, collaboration with banks and financial institutions. This experience allowed me to develop proficiency in navigating complex regulatory frameworks, ensuring accurate payroll processing, maintaining financial records, and fostering effective partnerships with financial entities.

projects.title: Supplement Website
projects.category: Website I built for a small supplement store
